text: Anthony Parkes (born 5 May 1949) is an English former professional footballer. He is known for playing and managing Blackburn Rovers F.C. from 1969 to 2009. In 2020, Parkes revealed that he had been diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Blackburn Rovers F.C. players Category:People with Alzheimer's disease Category:Sportspeople from Sheffield
title: Tony Parkes
